work.name: Loyal Health
work.summary: Member of a team that created and supported a chat bot for health systems, provided internal CI/CD support, and
highlights: Created a backend service for utilizing Chat GPT to utilize a RAG system for creating responses to incoming messages, created agents to interact with internal and external API's
Worked directly with internal customer service team to reduce the time they spent supporting customers
Lead initiative for redeveloping dialog system to allow for quicker setup and onboarding of new employees, 50% decrease in ramp up time for new hires
Integrated with Epic API to pull patient information from MyChart
Utilized a feedforward neural network to predict what a user was looking for
Integrated with Infermedica API to create a workflow where users could check symptoms and recieve a tenative diagnosis to take to Dr. apptointment
Supported a live text chat system, utilized Signal R for real time messaging over websocket
Built a service to consume Kafka messages and pull data for Health Risk Assessment forms from a common service
Maintained a python service for training natural language models using Tensorflow
Maintained an entity system to be used with intents for incoming utterance predictions
Utilized worker patterns to complete work async from main thread where speed was important
Monitored and Optimized slow SQL Queries using execution plans to improve our response time from chat bot
Created and Stored cached information in redis for reducing strain on database
Created an NPM package utilizing rollup to share components between multiple projects
Created and Maintained CI/CD pipelines
Created a service that was deployed as a docker image that was utilized in CI/CD pipelines using DBUP to automatically apply migrations during deployments
Deployed to Kubernetes to be able to scale horizontally with services as required
Used Helm charts to template the kubernetes configuration files
Used Docker to create versioned images of services that were deployed to kubernetes cluster

highlights: Started the company
